Russia launches drone attacks on Kyiv, southern Ukraine - Ukraine's militaryRussia launched drone attacks overnight on Kyiv and southern Ukraine, injuring at least one civilian and damaging a gas pipeline and residential buildings in the river and sea port of Mykolaiv, Ukraine's military said on Sunday. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 05:54:55 GMT NGUD5ZQJBFP27AAKYBO2DWNDUI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-drone-attacks-kyiv-southern-ukraine-ukrainian-military-2024-02-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Indonesia presidential frontrunner skips press freedom eventTwo of Indonesia's three presidential contenders pledged to protect press freedom in the world's third-largest democracy at a weekend event that frontrunner Prabowo Subianto didn't attend. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 05:49:14 GMT BVV6W46HUZOGRBRW536UDNE3TY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-presidential-frontrunner-skips-press-freedom-event-2024-02-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
IMF's Georgieva says she's confident on global economic outlook despite uncertaintiesThe managing director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF), Kristalina Georgieva, said on Sunday she was confident about the economic outlook despite uncertainties around war and geopolitics as the global economy has remained resilient. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 05:45:00 GMT Z6HBGDJ4VZOJ5PESUGV5ONJSAM https://www.reuters.com/markets/imfs-georgieva-says-she-is-confident-economic-outlook-despite-uncertainties-2024-02-11/Maha Dahan, Federico Maccioni市场
Indonesia scraps plan to buy Mirage fighter jets from QatarIndonesia has ditched a controversial plan to buy 733 million euros ($790 million) worth of Mirage 2000-5 fighter jets previously used by Qatar, the defence ministry spokesperson said late on Saturday. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 03:44:07 GMT K7BHPEQGNFJLXFATT2JRDB3DH4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/indonesia-scraps-plan-buy-mirage-fighter-jets-qatar-2024-02-11/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Philippine landslide death toll climbs to 37The number of people killed by a landslide in the southern Philippines has risen to 37, an official said on Sunday, as rescue workers continued to dig through mud even as hope of finding more survivors dimmed. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 02:58:25 GMT KBPYPQOQQ5NQXD2XNGWS2K4BXU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippine-landslide-death-toll-climbs-35-2024-02-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Aspiring Mexican congressional candidate killed in central state of MorelosAn aspiring congressional candidate for Mexico's ruling Morena party was assassinated on Saturday in the central Mexican state of Morelos, the president of Ecatepec municipality said on social media, months before Mexico's general elections. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 02:39:20 GMT KZXV2O2BBZKCRMGK2RVC3RB4VQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/aspiring-mexican-congressional-candidate-killed-central-state-morelos-2024-02-11/Reuters世界美洲
Taiwan reports more Chinese balloons over Taiwan StraitTaiwan's defence ministry said on Sunday it had detected eight Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, of which five flew across Taiwan, the second day in a row is has reported a large number of balloons. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 01:21:25 GMT E2BUIBOAHFIRJEXWWXKJQHZKCI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-more-chinese-balloons-over-taiwan-strait-2024-02-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Myanmar junta enforces mandatory military service for young peopleMyanmar’s junta has declared mandatory military service for all young men and women, state media said on Saturday, as it struggles to contain armed rebel forces fighting for greater autonomy in various parts of the country. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 00:18:55 GMT 46NIRDXTCBNGXOZUZSK7CUQNII https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-junction-enforces-mandatory-military-service-young-people-2024-02-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Nigeria's Access Bank Group CEO among six dead in California helicopter crashSix people, including the group chief executive of one of Nigeria's largest lenders, were killed in a helicopter crash in Southern California on Friday, authorities said. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 00:10:00 GMT GGEMAS4TZBLXNP2UPP3GM2MIOI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigerias-access-bank-group-ceo-among-six-dead-california-helicopter-crash-2024-02-11/Reuters世界非洲
Finland's Stubb seen as frontrunner in presidential run-offCentre-right Alexander Stubb of the National Coalition Party is the frontrunner in Finland's presidential run-off on Sunday, according to opinion polls, as the Nordic country elects a new leader of its security and foreign policy. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 00:03:34 GMT X4JAPXZOUNPJBHRTMKR2GPNEW https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finland-stubb-seen-frontrunner-presidential-run-off-2024-02-11/Anne Kauranen世界欧洲
First female Argentine saint brings together Pope Francis and MileiPope Francis on Sunday will elevate to sainthood the first female saint from his native Argentina, an event that will be attended at the Vatican by his former strong critic, Argentine President Javier Milei. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 23:10:09 GMT XML4IGSRKNJZ3ALXJK6HAV2YD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/first-female-argentinean-saint-brings-together-pope-francis-milei-2024-02-10/Alvise Armellini世界
